name: REX Protocol
tagline: Web3 Central Limit Orderbook DEX - No-Fee Trades, Margin, and Shorts!
description: REX Protocol has built REX Exchange, a central limit orderbook DEX that offers free trades, spot margin trading, and shorting in a front-running proof, non-custodial decentralized exchange./n/nREX Protocol, by origin, is a real estate liquidity protocol. Enabling property owners around the world to tokenize and trade their assets. Throughout the development of their RWA platform, the team created a DEX that filled a hole the DeFi world currently has. A decentralized platform that has the simplicity and functionality of centralized exchanges with the benefits and securities of decentralized exchanges. Which has prompted the release of the REX Exchange as a standalone crypto exchange.
